TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Create Payment Address
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Provide your payout wallet address and callback URL to PayBear API.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Ask for Payment
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Show your customer the wallet address as well as the payment amount.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Get Paid
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Payment is sent to the payout wallet immediately.

TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.title: Get Payment Notification.
TRANSACTIONS_FEATURE.des: Callbacks are sent to the URL you specified. You can process customer order
